avdta.demand

Class ReadDemandNetwork

  • java.lang.Object
    • avdta.network.ReadNetwork
      • avdta.demand.ReadDemandNetwork
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ReadDTANetwork, ReadSAVNetwork

    public class ReadDemandNetwork
extends ReadNetwork
    This includes methods to create and read demand

    • Method Detail

      • prepareDemand

        public int prepareDemand(DemandProject project,
                         double prop)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        This generates the demand file using the demand_profile and dynamic_od files. The demand file will be overwritten. Vehicles are generated somewhat randomly. The integer number of vehicles is created, and fractional vehicles are discretized via random number generator.
        Parameters:
        project - the project
        prop - the proportion of total demand
        Returns:
        the number of vehicles generated
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if a file cannot be accessed

      • createDynamicOD

        public void createDynamicOD(DemandProject project)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        This generates the dynamic_od file from the static_od and demand_profile files. Note that the dynamic_od file will be overwritten. The static_od is separated by assignment intervals according to the demand_profile.
        Parameters:
        project - the project
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if a file cannot be accessed.

      • readDemandProfile

        public DemandProfile readDemandProfile(DemandProject project)
                                throws java.io.IOException
        This reads the demand profile associated with the project.
        Parameters:
        project - the project
        Returns:
        the demand profile
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the file cannot be accessed
        See Also:
        DemandProfile

        Returns:
        the header for the demand file

      • changeDynamicType

        public void changeDynamicType(DemandProject project,
                              java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Double> proportionMap)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        This changes the type of vehicles in the dynamic_od file to match the specified proportions. The proportions should sum to 1. This rewrites the dynamic_od file.
        Parameters:
        project - the project
        proportionMap - a mapping of type codes to proportions
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if a file cannot be accessed

      • changeStaticType

        public void changeStaticType(DemandProject project,
                             java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Double> proportionMap)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        This changes the type of vehicles in the static_od file to match the specified proportions. The proportions should sum to 1. This rewrites the static_od file.
        Parameters:
        project - the project
        proportionMap - a mapping of type codes to proportions
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if a file cannot be accessed

      • sanityCheck

        public int sanityCheck(DemandProject project,
                       java.io.PrintStream fileout)
        Performs a sanity check on the network data contained within the Project.
        Parameters:
        project - the Project
        fileout - the PrintStream to print errors to
        Returns:
        the number of errors found
